title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, copy, delete models via Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same capabilities as Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs, chat, or embeddings inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, dark/light themes, mobile friendly).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, list, copy, delete models from JVM apps.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG pipeline combining Ollama, ChromaDB, and LangChain for local document Q&A.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: chatbot-ollama
summary: Minimal React chatbot component that talks to Ollama over HTTP; drop-in for any React site.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU support and model pre-loading.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, history, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop GUI for Ollama (macOS, Linux, Windows) with chat and model manager.

title: ollama-nvidia-triton
summary: Bridge exposing Ollama models through NVIDIA Triton Inference Server for enterprise GPU serving.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama; async client for chat, generate, pull, list, embed with Tokio.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama supporting chat, generation, embeddings, and streaming via HttpClient.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers users with Ollama models; slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app integrating Ollama models as a conversational bot with DM and channel support.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes using Ollama for summarization or Q&A.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django package adding Ollama models as chat endpoints with admin UI and API keys.
